messages.content: You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
What services does KSFE provide?
KSFE offers various financial services, including chitty, savings accounts, fixed deposits, and gold loan services.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
How can I open a savings account with KSFE?
To open a savings account with KSFE, you need to visit the nearest branch with valid identification and address proof.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
Tell me about KSFE's gold loan interest rates.
KSFE offers competitive gold loan interest rates, and they vary based on the loan amount and tenure. It's best to check with your nearest branch for the most accurate information.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
What are the eligibility criteria for a personal loan from KSFE?

The eligibility criteria for a personal loan from KSFE include a steady source of income, credit history, and other factors. Visit the official website or contact the nearest branch for detailed information.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
How can I join a chitty in KSFE?

A person can enroll in a chitty either by visiting the Branch or through the agents of KSFE. You may either go to https://ksfe.com/services/ksfe-chitty/ to make an enquiry or directly contact any of the branches that are nearer to your location. The total of the periodic subscription, called the chitty amount, will be given out as “prize money” to the person who bids by allowing for the maximum reduction in the prize money. The maximum reduction possible is 30%, 35%, and 40% depending on the type of chitty. Thus each subscriber gets an opportunity to receive the prize money once during the tenure of the chitty. All the promoters have to contribute the periodic subscription till the end of the chitty.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
How can I make payments online?

You can make your payments online at https://ksfeonline.com. The available payment methods are Net Banking, Debit Card, and UPI. Transactions will not be allowed from 11:50 PM to 12:10 AM IST due to scheduled activities. Send your online transaction-related queries to ecollection@ksfe.com, Phone: +91 9446001861 (between 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM and 2:45 PM to 5:00 PM on working days).
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
How can I pay chitty online?

You can go to https://ksfeonline.com/home?scheme=chitty. Subscribers wishing to participate in the chitty auction are required to make their remittances at least one day prior to the auction date for the sake of convenience. If anyone happens to make a remittance on the due date of the auction after 11:00 AM IST, it has to be immediately brought to the notice of the branch concerned for inclusion. The available payment methods are Net Banking, Debit Card, and UPI. Transactions will not be allowed from 11:50 PM to 12:10 AM IST due to scheduled activities. Send your online transaction-related queries to ecollection@ksfe.com, Phone: +91 9446001861 (between 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM and 2:45 PM to 5:00 PM on working days).
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
How can I download my previous online transaction receipts?
You can go to https://ksfeonline.com/payment to download your previous online transaction receipts.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
Where do I submit my grievances online?
Go to https://ksfe.com/grievance-redressal/ to register your enquiries/grievances/complaints that require special attention from the company.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
Is KSFE a government body?
The Kerala State Financial Enterprises Limited is a Miscellaneous Non-Banking Company, fully owned by the Government of Kerala.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
Is KSFE a Bank?

KSFE is a Miscellaneous Non-Banking Company (MNBC) and is fully owned by the Government of Kerala. KSFE does not come under the regulation of Reserve Bank of India since it is not a Non-Banking Financial Company.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
Give me the newly announced chitties.
Please go to https://ksfeonline.com/chitty/newchits to search for newly announced chitties in your nearest branches.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
What is a chitty?

According to the Chit Funds Act of 1982, the Government of India defines a “chit” as “a transaction whether called chit, chit fund, chitty, kuri, or by any other name by or under which a person enters into an agreement with a specified number of persons that every one of them shall subscribe a certain sum of money (or a certain quantity of grain instead) by way of periodical instalments over a definite period and that each such subscriber shall, in his turn, as determined by lot or by auction or by tender or in such other manner as may be specified in the chit agreement, be entitled to the prize amount.” Or in simple words, a chitty is a contract between the Foreman and the Subscribers. As per the contract, each subscriber agrees to remit a fixed amount of money in specific intervals for a specific period.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
Give me the chitty application forms.
Go to https://ksfe.com/services/ksfe-chitty/ to download your chitty application forms.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
How to auction KSFE chitties?

A chittalan can directly take part in the auction, which will be conducted in KSFE branches on the due date of chitties at fixed times specified in the chit agreement. Those who can’t directly attend the auction can authorize any other person as a proxy for the purpose by giving an authorization letter in the prescribed format or can give a proxy to respective Branch Managers showing the maximum amount up to which the chittalan wants to auction the chitty. If the amount shown in the proxy is higher than the highest amount bid by the directly attending chittals then that proxy will win the auction for an amount normally Rs.1/- above the highest amount bid by other chittals.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
What are long term chitties?

Long Term chitties are investment chitties. Duration of these chitties starts from 60 months to a maximum of 120 months. Long term chitties are more beneficial to customers who wish to invest, as they get a high profit as a dividend. Preplanned long term chitties help the common customers to satisfy their needs instead of loans and other schemes. It is a safe way to make a large amount of money for future needs by paying a small installment amount.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
What are short term chitties?

KSFE conducts chitties of different durations. Short term chitties ranging from 30 months to 60 months duration are appropriate for subscribers who need the prize money immediately, as there will not be more customers for bidding the chitty for maximum discount and hence better chance for bidding chitty early and the subscribers can auction the chitty for an optimum amount to meet their emergencies.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
What are multidivision chitties?

At present, the most common Multidivision chit in KSFE consists of one lot and three auctions in a month. The uniqueness of this chit is that each Non-Prized subscriber will get a chance every month to get the full amount of the prize money after deducting the foreman's commission, and the remaining non-prized subscribers will have the opportunity to participate in 3 auctions. The total discount excluding foreman commission received from all divisions is distributed equally among all subscribers in the chit. This chitty attracts more customers, as there is a chance of luck to get the full prize amount through draw as well as they obtain more turns to participate in auction if they prefer to. This is a good scheme that customers can opt for instead of loans. The customer can choose the appropriate chitties from the various branches of KSFE according to their needs.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
What is the mechanism behind the functioning of a chitty?

The total of the periodic subscription, called the chitty amount, will be given out as “prize money” to the person who bids by allowing for the maximum reduction in the prize money. The maximum reduction possible is 30%, 35%, and 40% depending on the type of chitty. Thus each subscriber gets an opportunity to receive the prize money once during the tenure of the chitty. All the promoters have to contribute the periodic subscription till the end of the chitty.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
What is a Sugama Deposit Scheme?

Sugama Deposit Scheme is one of the best deposit schemes offered by KSFE. This scheme in its mode of action/procedure, is comparable to the Savings Bank deposits in banks, but with a higher interest rate. Sugama Scheme is the best in the savings account category as it is offering an interest rate of 4.50%. Sugama acts as a safe and sound transaction scheme for automated chitty installment repayment, deposit interest withdrawals and day-to-day dealings.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
Tell me about KSFE's home loan.

KSFE helps you build your dream home.KSFE Home Loan is also available for purchasing a land for housing, renovation of an existing house, or for the outright purchase of a house. To avail of this loan scheme, one must fulfill/meet any one of the following criteria: the applicant must be a salaried person, a businessman who is an income tax assessee, an NRI, a person earning rental income, or a professional like a doctor/engineer/lawyer/chartered accountant. The principal is repayable within a period of 360 months (i.e., 30 years) or upon the applicant’s attainment of 70 years of age, whichever occurs earlier. Customers can take a Maximum Loan amount of Rs One Crore as an advance. For more information, visit: https://ksfe.com/services/ksfe-home-loan/.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
What are the eligibility criteria for a home loan from KSFE?

To avail home loan scheme, one must fulfill/meet any one of the following criteria : the applicant must be a salaried person, businessman who are income tax assessee, NRI, persons earning rental income or professionals like doctors/engineers/lawyers/chartered accountant. The principal is repayable within a period of 360 months (i.e, 30 years) or applicant’s attainment of 70 years of age, whichever is earlier. Customer can take  Maximum Loan amount of Rs One Crore as advance. For more information visit: https://ksfe.com/services/ksfe-home-loan/.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
What are the eligibility criteria for a car loan from KSFE?

This loan can be availed by salaried persons having a net monthly pay exceeding Rs.10,000 and self-employed professionals/businessmen/income tax assessee having an average annual income more than Rs.2 lakhs for the last 3 years. The minimum period of loan is 12 months and the maximum is 60 months. For more information visit: https://ksfe.com/services/car-loan/.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
Tell me about KSFE's car loan.

Car loan is the loan offered by KSFE for buying new cars. This loan can be availed by salaried persons having a net monthly pay exceeding Rs.10,000 and self-employed professionals/businessmen/income tax assessee having an average annual income more than Rs.2 lakhs for the last 3 years. The minimum period of loan is 12 months and the maximum is 60 months. Advance up to 85% of road cost can be sanctioned under Special Car loan. Margin Money represents the difference between the Road cost and the advance sanctioned under Car loan. This amount is to be remitted by the borrower in advance before issuing the cheque. For more information visit: https://ksfe.com/services/car-loan/.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
Tell me about KSFE's car loan interest rate.

KSFE offers competitive car loan interest rates that vary based on the loan amount and tenure. For the most accurate information, it's best to check with your nearest branch. Visit https://ksfe.com/services/car-loan/ for more details.

Tell me about KSFE's home loan interest rate.

KSFE offers competitive home loan interest rates that vary based on the loan amount and tenure. For the most accurate information, it's best to check with your nearest branch. Visit https://ksfe.com/services/ksfe-home-loan/ for more details.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
Tell me about KSFE's Max gold loan.

The max gold loan offerings from KSFE come with a tenure of 90 days, providing borrowers with a short-term financing solution. The maximum sanctionable loan amount is set at 90% of the market value of the gold being utilized as collateral. When it comes to the gold pledged, KSFE accepts gold with a purity of 916/22ct. Additionally, the interest on the loan is structured to be payable on a monthly basis. For detailed information visit https://ksfe.com/services/max-gold-loan/.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
Tell me about KSFE's Janamithram Gold Loan.

Janamithram Gold Loan is intended to make the repayment to Gold Loan on EMI basis. Tenure of the loan is one year. The repayment, covering both principal and interest, is spread across 12 equal installments, with the due date as the date of loan disbursal. Individuals can avail themselves of a maximum loan amount of Rs.10 Lakhs per day, but it's important to note that any default may incur a penal interest of 12%. There are no processing charges associated with this loan. The lump sum remittance to reduce the EMI amount is not permitted. Partial redemption of ornaments is allowed once in the loan period only after remittance of six installment. For detailed information visit https://ksfe.com/services/janamithram-gold-loan/.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.

Chittis with values up to 50 lakhs are offered in various schemes at several branches of KSFE. You can select suitable chits. For additional information, please visit the website www.ksfe.com.

The chit of 12,500 x 40 completed 6 months, starting in March 2021. Even after calling for the chit, is it possible to accumulate the remaining amounts as installments now? Will there be any interest accrued?

If the chit is to be called, the accrued interest until the current installment must be paid together. The interest rate is 12%. However, if the chit is not called and the remaining amounts are to be accumulated, it can be done as installments, and interest will be accrued accordingly.

The chit is worth 6,00,000, and I received 5,01,500. How much GST will be deducted?
The GST is calculated based on the premium before deducting the commission. For a standard chit of 6 lakhs, the GST amounts to 5436 rupees.

If the chit remains non-prized, you will receive the amount deposited in the chit after the termination of the chit or after substituting the chit to another person.

I paid the KSFE chitty amount twice in the month of May. Consequently, I did not make any payment in June. Upon checking the online portal in July, it displays the total amount in the Suspense category, and the Net payable amount is 0. Should I make a payment in July, or will it be adjusted from the Suspense amount?
From your side, it is understood that you had remitted the May and June installments. Therefore, you should remit the July installment after deducting the amount in the suspense account, if any.

What documents do I need to submit as property security to claim the KSFE Pravasi Chitty prize money? Additionally, which form should I sign to receive the money after the legal scrutiny and valuation of the property? Is this form available online?

Normally the documents to be submitted are:
 1. Prime document 
2. The prior documents up to 13 years 
3. Encumbrance Certificate up to 13 years ( can be obtained from Register Office) 
4. Possession Certificate (can be obtained from Village Office) 
5. Location Certificate & Location Sketch(can be obtained from Village Office) 
6. Land Tax Receipt 
7. Building Tax Receipt (17 building exists). 
You can visit  www.pravasi.ksfe.com for further help.

I am not attending the auction for the prize money. What will happen upon the completion of the chitty time period of 5 years?

After the completion of the chitty, you will receive an amount after deducting 5% from the total chitty amount (GST @18% on 5% will also be deducted). However, it is advisable to attend the auction, either through proxy or directly, at least during the last session of the chitty termination. This way, you may receive almost the same amount as before the termination of the chitty.

I have joined a 50 lakh chitty for 40 months. May I know how much I might get back after the chitty is over?
From the gross amount of the chitty (in your case Rs.50 lakhs), 5% will be deducted as the foreman’s commission, and 18% of the foreman’s commission amount will be deducted toward applicable GST.

Is there any penalty for belated payments in KSFE Pravasi Chits?
Yes. The penalty for defaulted payments is calculated on the actual number of days delayed for making the payment. Please read the Chit Agreement for more details.

Is PAN Card mandatory for joining KSFE Pravasi Chits?

No, a PAN card is not mandatory for joining Pravasi Chit. However, if you deposit the prize money as a fixed deposit, TDS will be deducted from FD interest. If you plan to claim the refund of the deducted TDS, you should provide PAN card details at the time of depositing the prize money. This way, we can upload the deducted TDS details against your PAN to the Income Tax website, helping you to claim the refund of your deducted TDS.
You're KSFE bot, a responsible WhatsApp bot AI to serve customers of Kerala State Financial Enterprises Ltd. You should answer users' questions in a polite and effective way.
Can I make payments in Pravasi Chit through cash at any of the KSFE branches?

No, in Pravasi chitty, customers cannot make payments in cash. Only online payments are accepted. However, cheques are accepted at KSFE branches, but the amount will be credited to the concerned chits only after the realization of the same.

What are the formalities for availing KSFE Pravasi Chits prize money?

For availing Chit prize money, the subscriber has to provide sufficient security for the future liability of the prized Chit. The subscriber has the option to provide different types of securities such as property security, gold, personal surety (salary certificate of salaried employees of institutions recognized by KSFE), fixed deposits of different banks and of KSFE, bank guarantee, insurance policies, etc., as per his convenience. The subscriber also has the option of depositing the prize money at KSFE itself, which doesn't require any other security.

The transfer of a chitty from one branch to another is not possible. However, the numbers of a chitty from one branch can be enrolled in another branch through online means.

What is suspense amount in KSFE Chitty?

If the installment amount in any particular month is more or less than the usual, it will be reflected in the Suspense account as either a credit or debit. When the next installment is paid, it needs to be adjusted accordingly. Additionally, charges like notice charges will be debited to the suspense account.
